src:
侍ジャパン完封リレーでカナダに快勝　今永ら５投手で１１Ｋ「プレミア１２」に弾み

01 Nov 2019

　「侍ジャパン強化試合、日本３－０カナダ」（１日、沖縄セルラースタジアム那覇）
　侍ジャパンが被安打４の完封リレーでカナダに快勝。敗戦した前夜の借りを返し、５日に初戦を迎える国際大会「プレミア１２」へ向けて弾みをつけた。
　日本の強みである投手力を見せつけた。先発の今永（ＤｅＮＡ）は３回を１安打無失点、５者連続を含む６奪三振の快投。２番手の左腕大野（中日）も３回を２安打無失点。七回からは中川（巨人）、山本（オリックス）、山崎（ＤｅＮＡ）が１イニングずつ無失点に抑えた。５投手の継投で計１１三振を奪った。
　打線は迫力を欠いたが、四回に２四球を絡め、浅村（楽天）の二ゴロの間にノーヒットで先制。五回は山田（ヤクルト）の適時打、八回は近藤（日本ハム）の適時打で小刻みに加点した。
　国際大会「プレミア１２」の１次ラウンドは５日の初戦でベネズエラ、６日にプエルトリコ、７日に台湾と対戦する。
text:
Victory in Canada with SAMURAI JAPAN closing relay.

01 Nov 2019

"Samurai Japan Warm-up Game, Japan 3-0 Canada" (1st, Okinawa Cellular Stadium Naha)
侍 SAMURAI JAPAN wins over Canada with a hit relay 4 sealed relay. He returned to borrowed the night before the defeat, and gained momentum for the premier 12 international tournament, which will be held on the 5th.
Demonstrating the Japanese pitcher's strength. The starter Imanaga (DeNA) made three strikes, five strikes, and five strikeouts. Second-hand left arm Ohno (Chunichi) also scored three hits without hitting. From the seventh round, Nakagawa (Giant), Yamamoto (Orix), and Yamazaki (DeNA) held down one inning at a time. He lost 11 strikeouts in succession to 5 pitchers.
Although the batting line lacked power, it involved two spheres four times, and it was first hit with no hits between Asamura (Rakuten). Five times, Yamada (Yakult) was timely hit, and eight times, Kondo (Nippon Ham) was timely hit.
The first round of the international tournament “Premier 12” will be played against Venezuela on the first game on the 5th, Puerto Rico on the 6th, and Taiwan on the 7th.
